title: Radar Entrance Detection
description: Detect and count people entering or exiting a space using radar sensors and PSOC™ 6 processing
long_description: This project demonstrates an entrance counter system built with Infineon's XENSIV™ 60 GHz radar sensor (BGT60TR13C) and PSOC™ 6. By processing radar reflections, the system detects human entry and exit events in real time, enabling accurate people counting, occupancy monitoring, and smart building automation.

links.sub-heading: Test out the Entrance Counter for BGT60TR13C™ Radar
